Name: Customer Vocabulary
Description: Subset of IBM Knowledge Accelerator vocabulary that focuses on Customer Use Cases

Name: Customer Behavior
Description: The collection of concepts and metrics useful for analysis of customer behaviors that pretain to use cases such as finacial tendencies, account activity, marketing interactions, loyalty and social media sentiment. © Copyright IBM Corp. 2023. All Rights Reserved

Name: Customer 360
Description: The collection of basic demographic and personal concepts and metrics useful for analysis of customer segmentation, credit risk, loyalty and social media sentiment. © Copyright IBM Corp. 2023. All Rights Reserved
